name: The Companion's Journey
description:
The Companion’s Journey - Created for the Wowie Jam 4.0, a game made by a team of two bored high school students while they procrastinate on their school assignments: 

- ChronoAero ( https://chronoaero.itch.io/, https://chronoaero.github.io ) 

- Fake_Aaron ( https://fake-aaron.itch.io/ ) 

Embark on an arduous journey with AIs named Synn and Kipz. Kipz, a flying drone, is capable of calculating accurate laser shots. However, their charging times are just too slow. You, as Synn, are the one to help Kipz out in this situation. Collaborating with them is the key!

Controls:

WASD - move

Alt+F4 - exit
